pullrequest.title: Fix issue with visuals in gzclient after an entity gets deleted

content.raw: I am trying to create a .world example for it but am somehow unable to reproduce the issue. I am pretty sure I have an example at my workplace but don't have access to it right now. If you can wait until next week, I will make sure that the issue can be reproduced.
